articles.author: Liz Kruesi
articles.title: The lost continent of Zealandia has been mapped for the first time - National Geographic
articles.description: This enormous chunk of submerged continental crust sits between Antarctica and Australia, where it connected the landmasses as part of a supercontinent some 300 million years ago.
articles.content: After years of exploration and research, scientists have finished mapping a sunken continent that lurks beneath the South Pacific. This chunk of continental crust, driven to the depths millions of ye… [+6660 chars]
